name: DetoBot
description:
DetoBot is an action-adventure 2D platformer game, where a scientist that was kidnapped secretly build a robot to free himself. Take control of DetoBot the Robot as he take on the evil legion of robots to save you and your creator from this vile mechanical world!

In this game YOU control the robot called DetoBot, using W and D for horizontal movements, SPACE to jump, and MOUSE to aim and throw BAKUDANS. 

Used Assets:

CAINOS - Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props

FreeThePlayerOnGame - Pixel Art Basic Platform pack
